name: Nocturnus (Nabia Games)
description:
Parkour around the village and get the cassettes.

Nocturnus is a Single-Player, First Person parkour game where you are in a Portuguese village and you have to find all the cassettes available in the village to finish the game in the less time possible.

Features:

. Unique Visual Style

. Infinite Opportunities

. The Combination of Mechanics

Controls:

Move: WASD

Slide: Ctrl

Jump: Spacebar

Credits:

Afonso Simão - Game Designer / Project Manager

Daniela Quaresma - Game Artist

Vasco Santos - Game Programmer

Reinier van Zwieten - Composer / Sound Designer
